original_text: I will send wild animals against you, and they will rob you of your children, destroy your cattle and make you so few in number that your roads will be deserted.
korean_text: 내가 들짐승을 너희 중에 보내리니 그것들이 너희의 자녀를 움키고 너희 가축을 멸하며 너희의 수효를 줄이리니 너희의 길들이 황폐하리라

sentences.original_text: I will send wild animals against you
and they will rob you of your children
and make you so few in number
that your roads will be deserted
